Key - Interface in rsa_encryption
The Key interface provides methods for generating and retrieving keys.

The KeyGenerator class is responsible for generating RSA key pairs.

KeyPair - Class in rsa_encryption
The KeyPair class represents a pair of RSA keys, consisting of a public key and a private key.
